item.title: CVE-2021-23853|2024-09-17T00:25:32.494Z -- bosch -- cpp%20firmware
item.description: In Bosch IP cameras, improper validation of the HTTP header allows an attacker to inject arbitrary HTTP headers through crafted URLs.
